New Records: Dawid Malan scored his sixth century in only 23 ODIs
Key Match Events: Malan added 115 for the opening wicket with Jonny Bairstow (52 off 59 balls)
Malan added 151 runs in just 19.3 overs with a silken Joe Root (82 off 68 balls)
Left-arm seamer Shoriful Islam (3/75) with some subtle variations and off-spinner Mahedi Hasan (4/71) came back well towards the end of the innings
Malan's innings had 16 fours and five sixes
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bangladesh bowlers couldnâ€™t repeat their impressive show against Afghanistan
England, in a mini-slump, lost seven wickets for 68 runs, which prevented them from reaching 400-run total
Others: Dawid Malan teed off with a couple of sixes off Mustafizur Rahman (0/70)
Root also played with a lot of positive intent and executed a perfect ramp shot behind square when Mustafizur offered him the perfect pace and enough bounce to execute it to perfection
